config: As you ring in 2024, upgrade your Justia Connect membership to Justia Connect Pro and unlock our full suite of membership benefits, including:

description: The $200 Justia Credit so you can save on select Justia Marketing Solutions designed to bring your law firm new leads
Live & On-Demand CLE Courses so you can learn from leaders in the legal industry covering a wide range of topics
The Justia Connect Pro Badge so you catch the eye of more potential clients viewing your Justia Lawyer Directory profile

config: Plus, Justia Connect Pros get an enhanced Justia Profile in the Justia Lawyer Directory, the ability to choose featured reviews for their Justia Lawyer Directory profile, opportunities to stream webinar recordings on our platform, and more!.
